description: Man and Woman Facing Drug and Weapons Charges
maintext: Two people have been charged after South Simcoe Police say an assault rifle and about 25 grand worth of cocaine was seized. Officers took search warrants to two Bradford homes Thursday, as part of a month long investigation into Bradford drug trafficking. Two people were arrested, a 52-year-old man and 51-year-old woman, and the pair face Trafficking and Firearms charges.
title: Assault Rifle and $25k In Cocaine Seized During Two Bradford Raids
